description:
The Floodgate Sale is a Hommage to the IOTA History and everyone known what it means WEN the Floodgates will be open. And yes... It was true... Chrysalis opened the Floodgates. Without Chrysalis we werenÂ´t here yet. So here is your chance to get a unique FLOODGATE, where every FLOODGATE have a crazy color variation. ThatÂ´s it, how the game will start! 
 
- After a few problems, I am all the more pleased to be able to offer you the new Floodgates.  
As is standard for IOTA, a real moron simply involves a bit of drama about the floodgates.  So it's finally time to open the floodgates and officially prepare the trading card game.  But of course there is also something for the buyers of the 42 unique Floodgates.  Each first-time Floodgate owner will also receive one of the 91 Community Hero Special Edition Cards as a gift.  This will never be available to buy directly and can only be acquired through profits, trading or from third parties.  The SE Card 42 will be limited to 91 pieces... If you want to get one of the 5 hardcore collector rankings cards, you can't avoid this card either ðŸ˜… So it's time... 

##

##  Time to get them all.

## All first-time owners of a floodgate. Please visit iotatradingcards.com regularly to learn how to get your SE Card 42.

## Instructions for this will follow very soon :)


##  GET THEM ALL!!!  
##  The game starts really soon
name: IOTA Trading Cards - Open Floodgates
